An action/thriller centered on a woman who faces down assassins sent by her ex, a mob boss, while holed up in her apartment.

Director: Joe Lynch
Writers: Yale Hannon (screenplay), Yale Hannon (story)
Stars: Salma Hayek, Jennifer Blanc, Togo Igawa
Genres: Action | Thriller
Country: USA
Language: English
